kactus2:function.name: init_HAL
kactus2:function.description: Initializes the hall PRE REQUISITE FOR OTHER FUNCTIONS TO FUNCTION

kactus2:function.name: read_btn
kactus2:function.description: Reads all FPGA buttons, with LSB being button 0, the next one button 1, etc.

kactus2:function.name: set_led
kactus2:function.description: Sets all FPGA LEDs, with LSB being LED 0, the next one LED 1, etc.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: mask
kactus2:functionParameter.description: Bit mask for leds, with LSB being zero and so on.
